message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I believe a starting price of $1,100,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget considerations, but $900,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider a price of $1,050,000. This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $950,000?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  To be frank, $950,000 is cutting it very close to my bottom line. I can do $1,000,000, but I can't go any lower. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to work with me, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $980,000?
